lines.content: GiggleBytes is a interactive, task manager style chatbot that is still under development
Adds a simple task without any date/time attached.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 tasks in the list.
Adds a task that needs to be done before a specific date/time.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 6 tasks in the list.
Adds a task that starts and ends at specific times.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 7 tasks in the list.
**Command:** `Shows all tasks with their completion status.`
**Command:** `mark [number]: Marks the specified task as completed.`
Nice! >.< I've marked this task as done:
**Command:** `unmark [number]: Marks the specified task as not completed.`
OK ;-; , I've marked this task as not done yet:
**Command:** `exits and closes GiggleBytes, showing a summary of completed tasks.`
Byte you later! Hope to see you again soon!

System.out.println("  - Mark task as not done: Type 'unmark [number]'");
System.out.println("Byte you later! Hope to see you again soon! >.<");

System.out.println("Task storage is full! Can't add more tasks. ;-;");
